name: pound

name: wing-attack

name: whirlwind
description: Blows away the foe & ends battle.

name: fly

name: bind

description: Whips the foe with slender vines.

name: double-kick
description: A double kicking attack.

name: mega-kick

name: horn-attack
description: An attack using a horn to jab.

name: fury-attack

name: horn-drill
description: A one-hit KO, drill attack.

name: tackle
description: A full-body charge attack.

name: body-slam
description: An attack that may cause paralysis.

name: wrap

name: take-down

name: thrash

name: double-edge
description: A tackle that also hurts the user.

name: tail-whip
description: Lowers the foe's DEFENSE.

name: poison-sting
description: An attack that may poison the target.

name: pin-missile

name: leer

name: bite
description: An attack that may cause flinching.

name: growl

name: roar
description: Scares wild foes to end battle.

name: sing
description: May cause the foe to fall asleep.

name: supersonic
description: Sound waves that cause confusion.

name: disable
description: Disables the foe's most recent move.

name: acid
description: An attack that may lower DEFENSE.

name: ember

name: flamethrower
description: An attack that may inflict a burn.

name: mist

name: water-gun
description: Squirts water to attack.

name: hydro-pump

name: surf
description: A strong water- type attack.

description: An attack that may freeze the foe.

name: blizzard
description: An attack that may freeze the foe.

description: An attack that may confuse the foe.

name: bubble-beam

name: aurora-beam

name: hyper-beam
description: 1st turn: Attack 2nd turn: Rest

name: peck

name: mega-drain
description: Steals 1/2 of the damage inflicted.

name: thunder
description: An attack that may cause paralysis.

name: hypnosis

description: The user's level equals damage HP.

name: screech

name: double-team

name: harden

description: Heightens evasive­ ness.

description: Heightens the user's DEFENSE.

name: outrage

description: Steals 1/2 of the damage inflicted.

name: charm

name: milk-drink
description: Restores HP by 1/2 the max HP.

name: fury-cutter

name: steel-wing
description: Stiff wings strike the foe.

name: mean-look

name: attract
description: Makes the opposite gender infatuated.

name: sleep-talk
description: Randomly attacks while asleep.

name: heal-bell
description: Eliminates all status problems.

name: present
description: A bomb that may restore HP.

name: safeguard
description: Prevents all status problems.

name: pain-split

name: dynamic-punch

name: megahorn
description: A powerful charge attack.

name: dragon-breath
description: A strong breath attack.

name: baton-pass

name: encore

name: rapid-spin
description: A high-speed spinning attack.

name: sweet-scent
description: Reduces the foe's evasiveness.

name: iron-tail
description: An attack that may reduce DEFENSE.

name: metal-claw

name: vital-throw
description: A 2nd-strike move that never misses.

name: morning-sun
description: Restores HP (varies by time).

name: synthesis
description: Restores HP (varies by time).

name: moonlight
description: Restores HP (varies by time).

name: hidden-power
description: The power varies with the POKéMON.

name: cross-chop
description: Has a high criti­ cal hit ratio.

name: twister
description: Whips up a tornado to attack.

name: rain-dance
description: Boosts the power of WATER- type moves for 5 turns.

name: sunny-day
description: Boosts fire-type moves for 5 turns.

name: crunch
description: An attack that may lower SPCL.DEF.

name: mirror-coat
description: Counters a SPCL. ATK. move double.

name: psych-up
description: Copies the foe's stat changes.

name: extreme-speed
description: A powerful first- strike move.

name: ancient-power

name: shadow-ball
description: An attack that may lower SPCL.DEF.

name: future-sight
description: An attack that hits on 3rd turn.

name: rock-smash
description: An attack that may lower DEFENSE.

name: whirlpool
description: Traps the foe for 2-5 turns.

name: beat-up
description: Party POKéMON join in the attack.

name: fake-out
description: A 1st-turn, 1st-strike move that causes flinching.

name: uproar
description: Causes an uproar for 2 to 5 turns and prevents sleep.

name: stockpile
description: Charges up power for up to 3 turns.
effect: Raises Defense by 1; Raises Special Defense by 1

name: spit-up
description: Releases stockpiled power (the more the better).

name: swallow
description: Absorbs stockpiled power and restores HP.

name: heat-wave
description: Exhales a hot breath on the foe. May inflict a burn.

name: hail
description: Summons a hailstorm that strikes every turn.

name: torment
description: Torments the foe and stops successive use of a move.

name: flatter
description: Confuses the foe, but raises its SP. ATK.

name: will-o-wisp
description: Inflicts a burn on the foe with intense fire.

name: memento
description: The user faints and lowers the foe’s abilities.
effect: Lowers Attack by 2; Lowers Special Attack by 2

name: facade
description: Boosts ATTACK when burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

name: focus-punch
description: A powerful loyalty attack. The user flinches if hit.

name: follow-me
description: Draws attention to make foes attack only the user.

name: nature-power
description: The type of attack varies depending on the location.

name: charge
description: Charges power to boost the electric move used next.

name: taunt
description: Taunts the foe into only using attack moves.

name: helping-hand
description: A move that boosts the power of the ally’s attack in a Double Battle.

name: trick
description: Tricks the foe into trading held items.

name: role-play
description: Mimics the target and copies its special ability.

name: wish
description: A wish that restores HP. It takes time to work.

name: ingrain
description: Lays roots that restore HP. The user can’t switch out.

name: superpower
description: Boosts strength sharply, but lowers abilities.
effect: Lowers Attack by 1; Lowers Defense by 1

name: magic-coat
description: Reflects special effects back to the attacker.

name: recycle
description: Recycles a used item for one more use.

name: revenge
description: An attack that gains power if injured by the foe.

name: brick-break
description: Destroys barriers such as REFLECT and causes damage.

name: yawn
description: Lulls the foe into yawning, then sleeping next turn.

name: knock-off
description: Knocks down the foe’s held item to prevent its use.

name: endeavor
description: Gains power if the user’s HP is lower than the foe’s HP.

name: eruption
description: The higher the user’s HP, the more damage caused.

name: skill-swap
description: The user swaps special abilities with the target.

name: imprison
description: Prevents foes from using moves known by the user.

name: grudge
description: If the user faints, deletes the PP of the final move.

name: dive
description: Dives underwater the first turn and strikes next turn.

name: arm-thrust
description: Straight-arm punches that strike the foe 2 to 5 times.

name: tail-glow
description: Flashes a light that sharply raises SP. ATK.

name: luster-purge
description: Attacks with a burst of light. May lower SP. DEF.

name: mist-ball
description: Attacks with a flurry of down. May lower SP. ATK.

name: feather-dance
description: Envelops the foe with down to sharply reduce ATTACK.

name: teeter-dance
description: Confuses all POKéMON on the scene.

name: blaze-kick
description: A kick with a high critical- hit ratio. May cause a burn.

name: ice-ball
description: A 5-turn attack that gains power on successive hits.

name: slack-off
description: Slacks off and restores half the maximum HP.

name: hyper-voice
description: A loud attack that uses sound waves to injure.

name: poison-fang
description: A sharp-fanged attack. May badly poison the foe.

name: crush-claw
description: Tears at the foe with sharp claws. May lower DEFENSE.

name: meteor-mash
description: Fires a meteor-like punch. May raise ATTACK.

name: astonish
description: An attack that may shock the foe into flinching.

name: weather-ball
description: The move’s type and power change with the weather.

name: aromatherapy
description: Heals all status problems with a soothing scent.

name: fake-tears
description: Feigns crying to sharply lower the foe’s SP. DEF.

name: air-cutter
description: Hacks with razorlike wind. High critical-hit ratio.

name: overheat
description: Allows a full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK.

name: rock-tomb
description: Stops the foe from moving with rocks and cuts SPEED.

name: silver-wind
description: A powdery attack that may raise abilities.
effect: Raises Attack by 1; Raises Defense by 1; Raises Special Attack by 1; Raises Special Defense by 1; Raises Speed by 1

name: metal-sound
description: Emits a horrible screech that sharply lowers SP. DEF.

name: tickle
description: Makes the foe laugh to lower ATTACK and DEFENSE.
effect: Lowers Attack by 1; Lowers Defense by 1

name: cosmic-power
description: Raises DEFENSE and SP. DEF with a mystic power.
effect: Raises Defense by 1; Raises Special Defense by 1

name: water-spout
description: Inflicts more damage if the user’s HP is high.

name: shadow-punch
description: An unavoidable punch that is thrown from shadows.

name: extrasensory
description: Attacks with a peculiar power. May cause flinching.

name: sand-tomb
description: Traps and hurts the foe in quicksand for 2 to 5 turns.

name: sheer-cold
description: A chilling attack that causes fainting if it hits.

name: muddy-water
description: Attacks with muddy water. May lower accuracy.

name: bullet-seed
description: Shoots 2 to 5 seeds in a row to strike the foe.

name: aerial-ace
description: An extremely speedy and unavoidable attack.

name: icicle-spear
description: Attacks the foe by firing 2 to 5 icicles in a row.

name: iron-defense
description: Hardens the body’s surface to sharply raise DEFENSE.

name: block
description: Blocks the foe’s way to prevent escape.

name: howl
description: Howls to raise the spirit and boosts ATTACK.

name: dragon-claw
description: Slashes the foe with sharp claws.

name: bulk-up
description: Bulks up the body to boost both ATTACK and DEFENSE.
effect: Raises Attack by 1; Raises Defense by 1

name: bounce
description: Bounces up, then down the next turn. May paralyze.

name: mud-shot
description: Hurls mud at the foe and reduces SPEED.

name: poison-tail
description: Has a high critical-hit ratio. May also poison.

name: covet
description: Cutely begs to obtain an item held by the foe.

name: magical-leaf
description: Attacks with a strange leaf that cannot be evaded.

name: calm-mind
description: Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF by focusing the mind.
effect: Raises Special Attack by 1; Raises Special Defense by 1

name: leaf-blade
description: Slashes with a sharp leaf. High critical-hit ratio.

name: dragon-dance
description: A mystical dance that ups ATTACK and SPEED.
effect: Raises Attack by 1; Raises Speed by 1

name: rock-blast
description: Hurls boulders at the foe 2 to 5 times in a row.

name: shock-wave
description: A fast and unavoidable electric attack.

name: water-pulse
description: Attacks with ultrasonic waves. May confuse the foe

name: doom-desire
description: Summons strong sunlight to attack 2 turns later.

name: psycho-boost
description: Allows a full-power attack, but sharply lowers SP. ATK.

name: roost
description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: gravity
description: Gravity is intensified for five turns, making moves involving flying unusable and negating Levitation.

name: hammer-arm
description: The user swings and hits with its strong and heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

name: gyro-ball
description: The user tackles the foe with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

name: healing-wish
description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status cured.

name: brine
description: If the foe’s HP is down to about half, this attack will hit with double the power.

name: feint
description: An attack that hits a foe using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

name: pluck
description: The user pecks the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user plucks it and gains its effect.

name: tailwind
description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for three turns.

name: acupressure
description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its stats.

name: metal-burst
description: The user retaliates against the foe that last inflicted damage on it with much greater power.

name: u-turn
description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: close-combat
description: The user fights the foe in close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user’s Defense and Sp. Def.
effect: Lowers Defense by 1; Lowers Special Defense by 1

name: payback
description: If the user can use this attack after the foe attacks, its power is doubled.

name: assurance
description: If the foe has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled.

name: fling
description: The user flings its held item at the foe to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

name: psycho-shift
description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status problems to the target.

name: power-trick
description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.

name: gastro-acid
description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the foe. The fluid eliminates the effect of the foe’s ability.

name: copycat
description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

name: power-swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the foe.

name: guard-swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the foe.

name: last-resort
description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

name: worry-seed
description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the foe. It prevents sleep by making its ability Insomnia.

name: sucker-punch
description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the foe is not readying an attack, however.

name: toxic-spikes
description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the foe’s feet. They poison foes that switch into battle.

name: heart-swap
description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the foe.

name: aqua-ring
description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP on every turn.

name: magnet-rise
description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

name: flare-blitz
description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the foe. The user sustains serious damage, too.

name: force-palm
description: The foe is attacked with a shock wave. It may also leave the target paralyzed.

name: aura-sphere
description: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body. This move is certain to hit.

name: rock-polish
description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

name: poison-jab
description: The foe is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the foe.

name: dark-pulse
description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

name: night-slash
description: The user slashes the foe the instant an opportunity arises. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: aqua-tail
description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

name: seed-bomb
description: The user slams a barrage of hard- shelled seeds down on the foe from above.

name: air-slash
description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

name: x-scissor
description: The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

name: bug-buzz
description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

name: dragon-pulse
description: The foe is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth.

name: dragon-rush
description: The user tackles the foe while exhibiting overwhelming menace. It may also make the target flinch.

name: power-gem
description: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

name: drain-punch
description: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: vacuum-wave
description: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the foe. This move always goes first.

name: focus-blast
description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

name: energy-ball
description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

name: brave-bird
description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. The user also takes serious damage.

name: earth-power
description: The user makes the ground under the foe erupt with power. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

name: switcheroo
description: The user trades held items with the foe faster than the eye can follow.

name: giga-impact
description: The user charges at the foe using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.

name: nasty-plot
description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

name: bullet-punch
description: The user strikes with a tough punch as fast as a bullet. This move always goes first.

name: avalanche
description: An attack move that inflicts double the damage if the user has been hurt by the foe in the same turn.

name: ice-shard
description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them. This move always goes first.

name: shadow-claw
description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: thunder-fang
description: The user bites with electrified fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or become paralyzed.

name: ice-fang
description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or freeze.

name: fire-fang
description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the foe flinch or sustain a burn.

name: shadow-sneak
description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the foe from behind. This move always goes first.

name: mud-bomb
description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: psycho-cut
description: The user tears at the foe with blades formed by psychic power. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: zen-headbutt
description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and rams the foe. It may also make the target flinch.

name: flash-cannon
description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the foe’s Sp. Def stat.

name: defog
description: Obstacles are moved, reducing the foe’s evasion stat. It can also be used to clear deep fog, etc.

name: trick-room
description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

name: discharge
description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike all Pokémon in battle. It may also cause paralysis.

name: lava-plume
description: An inferno of scarlet flames washes over all Pokémon in battle. It may also inflict burns.

name: leaf-storm
description: A storm of sharp leaves is whipped up. The attack’s recoil sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: power-whip
description: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the foe.

name: rock-wrecker
description: The user launches a huge boulder at the foe to attack. It must rest on the next turn, however.

name: cross-poison
description: A slashing attack that may also leave the target poisoned. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: gunk-shot
description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the foe to attack. It may also poison the target.

name: iron-head
description: The foe slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

name: stone-edge
description: The user stabs the foe with a sharpened stone. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: stealth-rock
description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.

name: grass-knot
description: The user snares the foe with grass and trips it. The heavier the foe, the greater the damage.

name: chatter
description: The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the foe.

name: judgment
description: The user releases countless shots of light. Its type varies with the kind of Plate the user is holding.

name: bug-bite
description: The user bites the foe. If the foe is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

name: charge-beam
description: The user fires a concentrated bundle of electricity. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: wood-hammer
description: The user slams its rugged body into the foe to attack. The user also sustains serious damage.

name: aqua-jet
description: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

name: attack-order
description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.

name: defend-order
description: The user calls out its underlings to make a living shield, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.
effect: Raises Defense by 1; Raises Special Defense by 1

name: head-smash
description: The user delivers a life-endangering head butt at full power. The user also takes terrible damage.

name: double-hit
description: The user slams the foe with a tail, etc. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: roar-of-time
description: The user blasts the foe with power that distorts even time. The user must rest on the next turn.

name: spacial-rend
description: The user tears the foe along with the space around it. This move has a high critical-hit ratio.

name: lunar-dance
description: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

name: crush-grip
description: The foe is crushed with great force. The attack is more powerful the more HP the foe has left.

name: magma-storm
description: The foe becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that rages for two to five turns.

name: dark-void
description: The foe is dragged into a world of total darkness that puts it to sleep.

name: seed-flare
description: The user generates a shock wave from within its body. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.

name: ominous-wind
description: The user creates a gust of repulsive wind. It may also raise all the user’s stats at once.
effect: Raises Attack by 1; Raises Defense by 1; Raises Special Attack by 1; Raises Special Defense by 1; Raises Speed by 1

name: shadow-force
description: The user disappears, then strikes the foe on the second turn. It hits even if the foe used Protect.

name: hone-claws
description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.
effect: Raises Attack by 1; Raises Accuracy by 1

name: wide-guard
description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

name: guard-split
description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of its target’s.

name: power-split
description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target’s.

name: wonder-room
description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

name: psyshock
description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

name: venoshock
description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

name: autotomize
description: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

name: rage-powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.

name: magic-room
description: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns.

name: smack-down
description: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when hit.

name: storm-throw
description: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: sludge-wave
description: It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit.

name: quiver-dance
description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. It boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
effect: Raises Special Attack by 1; Raises Special Defense by 1; Raises Speed by 1

name: heavy-slam
description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater its damage.

name: electro-ball
description: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the damage.

name: soak
description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.

name: flame-charge
description: The user cloaks itself with flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user’s Speed stat.

name: coil
description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.
effect: Raises Attack by 1; Raises Defense by 1; Raises Accuracy by 1

name: low-sweep
description: The user attacks the target’s legs swiftly, reducing the target’s Speed stat.

name: acid-spray
description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: foul-play
description: The user turns the target’s power against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the damage.

name: simple-beam
description: The user’s mysterious psychic wave changes the target’s Ability to Simple.

name: entrainment
description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s.

name: after-you
description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

name: round
description: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.

name: echoed-voice
description: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage.

name: clear-smog
description: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All status changes are returned to normal.

name: stored-power
description: The user attacks the target with stored power. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the damage.

name: quick-guard
description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

name: ally-switch
description: The user teleports using a strange power and switches its place with one of its allies.

name: scald
description: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. It may also leave the target with a burn.

name: shell-smash
description: The user breaks its shell, lowering its Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raising Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.
effect: Lowers Defense by 1; Lowers Special Defense by 1; Raises Attack by 2; Raises Special Attack by 2; Raises Speed by 2

name: heal-pulse
description: The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: hex
description: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems.

name: shift-gear
description: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack and sharply raising its Speed.
effect: Raises Attack by 1; Raises Speed by 2

name: circle-throw
description: The user throws the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

name: incinerate
description: The user attacks the target with fire. If the target is holding a Berry, the Berry becomes burnt up and unusable.

name: quash
description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

name: acrobatics
description: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

name: reflect-type
description: The user reflects the target’s type, making it the same type as the target.

name: retaliate
description: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack’s damage increases.

name: final-gambit
description: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to the user’s HP.

name: inferno
description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.

name: volt-switch
description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: struggle-bug
description: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets’ Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

name: bulldoze
description: The user stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. Hit Pokémon’s Speed stat is reduced.

name: frost-breath
description: The user blows a cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: dragon-tail
description: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

name: work-up
description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.
effect: Raises Attack by 1; Raises Special Attack by 1

name: electroweb
description: The user captures and attacks opposing Pokémon by using an electric net. It reduces the targets’ Speed stat.

name: wild-charge
description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. It also damages the user a little.

name: drill-run
description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

name: dual-chop
description: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: horn-leech
description: The user drains the target’s energy with its horns. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

name: sacred-sword
description: The user attacks by slicing with its long horns. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

name: razor-shell
description: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This attack may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: heat-crash
description: The user slams its target with its flame- covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the damage.

name: leaf-tornado
description: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: cotton-guard
description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, drastically raising the user’s Defense stat.

name: night-daze
description: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. It may also lower the target’s accuracy.

name: psystrike
description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

name: tail-slap
description: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

name: hurricane
description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target.

name: head-charge
description: The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. It also damages the user a little.

name: gear-grind
description: The user attacks by throwing two steel gears at its target.

name: searing-shot
description: An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It may leave targets with a burn.

name: techno-blast
description: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.

name: relic-song
description: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of those listening. It may also induce sleep.

name: secret-sword
description: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.

name: glaciate
description: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This attack reduces the targets’ Speed stat.

name: bolt-strike
description: The user charges its target, surrounding itself with a great amount of electricity. It may leave the target with paralysis.

name: blue-flare
description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. It may leave the target with a burn.

name: fiery-dance
description: Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: snarl
description: The user yells as if it is ranting about something, making the target’s Sp. Atk stat decrease.

name: icicle-crash
description: The user attacks by harshly dropping an icicle onto the target. It may also make the target flinch.

name: v-create
description: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. It lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
effect: Lowers Defense by 1; Lowers Special Defense by 1; Lowers Speed by 1

name: fusion-flare
description: The user brings down a giant flame. This attack does greater damage when influenced by an enormous thunderbolt.

name: fusion-bolt
description: The user throws down a giant thunderbolt. This attack does greater damage when influenced by an enormous flame.

name: flying-press
description: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

name: belch
description: The user lets out a damaging belch at the target. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move.

name: sticky-web
description: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.

name: fell-stinger
description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises sharply.

name: phantom-force
description: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

name: trick-or-treat
description: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target’s type.

name: noble-roar
description: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
effect: Lowers Attack by 1; Lowers Special Attack by 1

name: parabolic-charge
description: The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

name: forests-curse
description: The user puts a forest curse on the target. Afflicted targets are now Grass type as well.

name: petal-blizzard
description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

name: freeze-dry
description: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

name: disarming-voice
description: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

name: parting-shot
description: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon.
effect: Lowers Attack by 1; Lowers Special Attack by 1

name: topsy-turvy
description: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

name: draining-kiss
description: The user steals the target’s energy with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

name: crafty-shield
description: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.

name: flower-shield
description: The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

name: grassy-terrain
description: The user turns the ground under everyone’s feet to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn.

name: misty-terrain
description: The user covers the ground under everyone’s feet with mist for five turns. This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions.

name: electrify
description: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes Electric type.

name: play-rough
description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat.

name: fairy-wind
description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it.

name: moonblast
description: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: boomburst
description: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound.

name: fairy-lock
description: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn.

name: kings-shield
description: The user takes a defensive stance while it protects itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack stat of any attacker who makes direct contact.

name: play-nice
description: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: confide
description: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: diamond-storm
description: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat.

name: steam-eruption
description: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: hyperspace-hole
description: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This also hits a target using Protect or Detect.

name: water-shuriken
description: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first.

name: mystical-fire
description: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: spiky-shield
description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.

name: aromatic-mist
description: The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

name: eerie-impulse
description: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: venom-drench
description: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.
effect: Lowers Attack by 1; Lowers Special Attack by 1; Lowers Speed by 1

name: geomancy
description: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.
effect: Raises Special Attack by 2; Raises Special Defense by 2; Raises Speed by 2

name: magnetic-flux
description: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
effect: Raises Defense by 1; Raises Special Defense by 1

name: electric-terrain
description: The user electrifies the ground under everyone’s feet for five turns. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

name: dazzling-gleam
description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

name: baby-doll-eyes
description: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.

name: nuzzle
description: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

name: infestation
description: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can’t flee during this time.

name: power-up-punch
description: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

name: oblivion-wing
description: The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

name: thousand-arrows
description: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.

name: thousand-waves
description: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those hit can’t flee from battle.

name: lands-wrath
description: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

name: origin-pulse
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.

name: precipice-blades
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

name: dragon-ascent
description: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds, although it lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def in the process.
effect: Lowers Defense by 1; Lowers Special Defense by 1

name: shore-up
description: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

name: first-impression
description: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.

name: spirit-shackle
description: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.

name: darkest-lariat
description: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

name: sparkling-aria
description: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles.

name: ice-hammer
description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however.

name: floral-healing
description: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.

name: high-horsepower
description: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

name: strength-sap
description: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target’s Attack stat. It also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: solar-blade
description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and fills a blade with the light’s energy, attacking the target on the next turn.

name: leafage
description: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

name: toxic-thread
description: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target’s Speed stat.

name: laser-focus
description: The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit.

name: gear-up
description: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
effect: Raises Attack by 1; Raises Special Attack by 1

name: throat-chop
description: The user attacks the target’s throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using moves that emit sound for two turns.

name: pollen-puff
description: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.

name: anchor-shot
description: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

name: psychic-terrain
description: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

name: lunge
description: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: fire-lash
description: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: power-trip
description: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power.

name: burn-up
description: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

name: speed-swap
description: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

name: smart-strike
description: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

name: purify
description: The user heals the target’s status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.

name: revelation-dance
description: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.

name: core-enforcer
description: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.

name: trop-kick
description: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

name: instruct
description: The user instructs the target to use the target’s last move again.

name: beak-blast
description: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it’s heating up its beak results in a burn.

name: clanging-scales
description: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon. The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.

name: dragon-hammer
description: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

name: brutal-swing
description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

name: aurora-veil
description: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.

name: shell-trap
description: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on the opposing Pokémon.

name: fleur-cannon
description: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: psychic-fangs
description: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.

name: stomping-tantrum
description: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

name: accelerock
description: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

name: liquidation
description: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat.

name: prismatic-laser
description: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: spectral-thief
description: The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.

name: sunsteel-strike
description: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target  regardless of its Abilities.

name: moongeist-beam
description: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of  its Abilities.

name: tearful-look
description: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
effect: Lowers Attack by 1; Lowers Special Attack by 1

name: zing-zap
description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

name: natures-madness
description: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target’s HP.

name: multi-attack
description: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the target. The memory held determines the move’s type.

name: mind-blown
description: The user attacks everything around it by causing its own head to explode. This also damages the user.

name: plasma-fists
description: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

name: photon-geyser
description: The user attacks a target with a pillar of light. This move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever stat is higher for the user.

name: double-iron-bash
description: The user rotates, centering the hex nut in its chest, and then strikes with its arms twice in a row. This may also make the target flinch.

name: dynamax-cannon
description: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.

name: snipe-shot
description: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.

name: jaw-lock
description: This move prevents the user and the target from switching out until either of them faints. The effect goes away if either of the Pokémon leaves the field.

name: stuff-cheeks
description: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply raises its Defense stat.

name: no-retreat
description: This move raises all the user’s stats but prevents the user from switching out or fleeing.
effect: Raises Attack by 1; Raises Defense by 1; Raises Special Attack by 1; Raises Special Defense by 1; Raises Speed by 1

name: tar-shot
description: The user pours sticky tar over the target, lowering the target’s Speed stat. The target becomes weaker to Fire-type moves.

name: magic-powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of magic powder that changes the target to Psychic type.

name: dragon-darts
description: The user attacks twice using Dreepy. If there are two targets, this move hits each target once.

name: teatime
description: The user has teatime with all the Pokémon in the battle. Each Pokémon eats its held Berry.

name: octolock
description: The user locks the target in and prevents it from fleeing. This move also lowers the target’s Defense and Sp. Def every turn.

name: bolt-beak
description: The user stabs the target with its electrified beak. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

name: fishious-rend
description: The user rends the target with its hard gills. If the user attacks before the target, the power of this move is doubled.

name: court-change
description: With its mysterious power, the user swaps the effects on either side of the field.

name: clangorous-soul
description: The user raises all its stats by using some of its HP.
effect: Raises Attack by 1; Raises Defense by 1; Raises Special Attack by 1; Raises Special Defense by 1; Raises Speed by 1

name: body-press
description: The user attacks by slamming its body into the target. The higher the user’s Defense, the more damage it can inflict on the target.

name: decorate
description: The user sharply raises the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats by decorating the target.
effect: Raises Attack by 2; Raises Special Attack by 2

name: drum-beating
description: The user plays its drum, controlling the drum’s roots to attack the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.

name: pyro-ball
description: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

name: aura-wheel
description: Morpeko attacks and raises its Speed with the energy stored in its cheeks. This move’s type changes depending on the user’s form.

name: breaking-swipe
description: The user swings its tough tail wildly and attacks opposing Pokémon. This also lowers their Attack stats.

name: branch-poke
description: The user attacks the target by poking it with a sharply pointed branch.

name: overdrive
description: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by twanging a guitar or bass guitar, causing a huge echo and strong vibration.

name: apple-acid
description: The user attacks the target with an acidic liquid created from tart apples. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat.

name: grav-apple
description: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

name: spirit-break
description: The user attacks the target with so much force that it could break the target’s spirit. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: life-dew
description: The user scatters mysterious water around and restores the HP of itself and its ally Pokémon in the battle.

name: obstruct
description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession. Direct contact harshly lowers the attacker’s Defense stat.

name: false-surrender
description: The user pretends to bow its head, but then it stabs the target with its disheveled hair. This attack never misses.

name: meteor-assault
description: The user attacks wildly with its thick leek. The user can’t move on the next turn, because the force of this move makes it stagger.

name: eternabeam
description: This is Eternatus’s most powerful attack in its original form. The user can’t move on the next turn.

name: expanding-force
description: The user attacks the target with its psychic power. This move’s power goes up and damages all opposing Pokémon on Psychic Terrain.

name: steel-roller
description: The user attacks while destroying the terrain. This move fails when the ground hasn’t turned into a terrain.

name: terrain-pulse
description: The user utilizes the power of the terrain to attack. This move’s type and power changes depending on the terrain when it’s used.

name: skitter-smack
description: The user skitters behind the target to attack. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

name: flip-turn
description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: dual-wingbeat
description: The user slams the target with its wings. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: jungle-healing
description: The user becomes one with the jungle, restoring HP and healing any status conditions of itself and its ally Pokémon in battle.

name: wicked-blow
description: The user, having mastered the Dark style, strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

name: thunder-cage
description: The user traps the target in a cage of sparking electricity for four to five turns.

name: dragon-energy
description: Converting its life-force into power, the user attacks opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.

name: dire-claw
description: The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws, aiming to land a critical hit. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or drowsy.

name: psyshield-bash
description: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This may also raise the user’s defensive stats.

name: stone-axe
description: The user swings its stone axes at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Stone splinters left behind by this attack continue to damage the target for several turns.

name: springtide-storm
description: The user attacks by wrapping the target in fierce winds brimming with love and hate. This move’s additional effects depend on the user’s form.

name: mystical-power
description: The user strengthens itself with a mysterious power. If it excels in offense, its offensive stats are raised. If it excels in defense, its defensive stats are raised.

name: raging-fury
description: The user rampages and spews vicious flames to inflict damage on the target, then becomes fixated on using this move.

name: wave-crash
description: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user and raises the user’s action speed.

name: headlong-rush
description: The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user’s defensive stats.

name: barb-barrage
description: The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move’s power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

name: shelter
description: The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, raising its defensive stats. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.

name: bleakwind-storm
description: The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also leave the target with frostbite.

name: wildbolt-storm
description: The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

name: sandsear-storm
description: The user attacks by wrapping the target in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This also leaves the target with a burn.

name: lunar-blessing
description: The user heals its own status conditions and restores its HP. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.

name: take-heart
description: The user lifts its spirits, healing its own status conditions and raising its offensive and defensive stats.

name: silk-trap
description: The user spins a silken trap, protecting itself from damage while lowering the Speed stat of any attacker that makes direct contact.

name: axe-kick
description: The user attacks by kicking up into the air and slamming its heel down upon the target. This may also confuse the target. If it misses, the user takes damage instead.

name: last-respects
description: The user attacks to avenge its allies. The more defeated allies there are in the user's party, the greater the move's power.

name: lumina-crash
description: The user attacks by unleashing a peculiar light that even affects the mind. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

name: order-up
description: The user attacks with elegant poise. If the user has a Tatsugiri in its mouth, this move boosts one of the user's stats based on the Tatsugiri's form.

name: jet-punch
description: The user summons a torrent around its fist and punches at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

name: spicy-extract
description: The user emits an incredibly spicy extract, sharply boosting the target's Attack stat and harshly lowering the target's Defense stat.

name: spin-out
description: The user spins furiously by straining its legs, inflicting damage on the target. This also harshly lowers the user's Speed stat.

name: population-bomb
description: The user’s fellows gather in droves to perform a combo attack that hits the target one to ten times in a row.

name: ice-spinner
description: The user covers its feet in thin ice and twirls around, slamming into the target. This move's spinning motion also destroys the terrain.

name: glaive-rush
description: The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge. After this move is used, attacks on the user cannot miss and will inflict double damage until the user’s next turn.

name: revival-blessing
description: The user bestows a loving blessing, reviving a party Pokémon that has fainted and restoring half that Pokémon's max HP.

name: salt-cure
description: The user salt cures the target, inflicting damage every turn. Steel and Water types are more strongly affected by this move.

name: triple-dive
description: The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting the target with splashes of water three times in a row.

name: mortal-spin
description: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also poisons opposing Pokémon.

name: doodle
description: The user captures the very essence of the target in a sketch. This changes the Abilities of the user and its ally Pokémon to that of the target.

name: fillet-away
description: The user sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats by using its own HP.

name: kowtow-cleave
description: The user slashes at the target after kowtowing to make the target let down its guard. This attack never misses.

name: flower-trick
description: The user throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the target. This attack never misses and always lands a critical hit.

name: torch-song
description: The user blows out raging flames as if singing a song, scorching the target. This also boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

name: aqua-step
description: The user toys with the target and attacks it using light and fluid dance steps. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

name: raging-bull
description: The user performs a tackle like a raging bull. This move's type depends on the user's form. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

name: make-it-rain
description: The user attacks by throwing out a mass of coins. This also lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat. Money is earned after the battle.

name: ruination
description: The user summons a ruinous disaster. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

name: collision-course
description: The user transforms and crashes to the ground, causing a massive prehistoric explosion. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it’s a supereffective hit.

name: electro-drift
description: The user races forward at ultrafast speeds, piercing its target with futuristic electricity. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it's a supereffective hit.

name: shed-tail
description: The user creates a substitute for itself using its own HP before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

name: tidy-up
description: The user tidies up and removes the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Toxic Spikes, and Substitute. This also boosts the user’s Attack and Speed stats.

name: snowscape
description: The user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns. This boosts the Defense stats of Ice types.

name: hyper-drill
description: The user spins the pointed part of its body at high speed to pierce the target. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

name: twin-beam
description: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

name: rage-fist
description: The user converts its rage into energy to attack. The more times the user has been hit by attacks, the greater the move's power.

name: armor-cannon
description: The user shoots its own armor out as blazing projectiles. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

name: bitter-blade
description: The user focuses its bitter feelings toward the world of the living into a slashing attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

name: double-shock
description: The user discharges all the electricity from its body to perform a high-damage attack. After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

name: gigaton-hammer
description: The user swings its whole body around to attack with its huge hammer. This move can't be used twice in a row.

name: comeuppance
description: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

name: aqua-cutter
description: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.
